Name: Prince of Wales
Ingredients: 1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: RUB sugar cube with lemon zest, coat with dashes of bitters and drop cube into chilled glass. POUR chilled cognac and liqueur over soaked cube and TOP with chilled champagne.
Review: More interesting than a Classic Champagne Cocktail.
History: Our page on the Champagne Cocktail gives more information on the history of this classic cocktail and its variants.
